attributes.action: why can mp's claim for a second home, whilst i can't receive jobseekers allowance because my wife takes home £116 a week!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I cannot claim jobseekers allowance as my wife takes home £116 a week... The government says we can live on £100.95 a week... What about money for mortgage, food, gas, electric, council tax, water rates... why is it the MP's can claim for a second home when there are thousands of people struggling to live on £100.95... We have paid taxes and national insurance for over 25 years.. What for!!!

rejection.details: Your petition asks a question rather than requesting an action. Please reword your petition an submit again.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
